entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer: Adjust code for numeric `IntPtr`. #72348
  • IMemoryCache is expiring unexpectedly in a nested use case #72345
  • [NativeAOT] update libunwind #72344
  • [NativeAOT] We should be able to hijack in funclets #72343
  • Multiple Jit compile errors on net6-ios target #72342
  • runtime-libraries stress-ssl pipeline is constantly failing #72340
  • [API Proposal]: Customize editor visibility of a symbol based on the language. #72337
  • `GetTypeByMetadataName` should be banned #72336
  • Namespaces determined from Metadata during load, parsed from name during query. #72334
  • Wrong Enter/Leave callbacks for DispatchTailCalls on Linux ARM32 #72333
  • Unable to pull image mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet-buildtools/prereqs:fedora-34-helix #72329

Closed

  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests - Assertion failed: ClientCertificates. Expected enumerable cloned value. #71233
    7.0.0
  • system.io.tests.disabledfilelockingswitchtests.configswitchishonored #72327
  • system.io.tests.filestream_ctor_options.filesharewithoutwritethrows #72330
  • ApartmentStateTest_ChangeBeforeThreadStarted failing #72232
  • Remove redundant check of 128-bit bitmap of zeros in regex #72312

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor `SymbolicRegexRunnerFactory`'s representation of the minterm set's type. #72349
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing sharing wasm builds, for running tests #72347
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Native AOT runtime changes for multiple package conflict #72346
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve reliability of some SafeHandle creations #72341
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Fix incorrect buffer reallocation in AcceptSecurityContext #72339
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve RegexCharClass.Analyze for sets with subtraction #72328
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

Merged

  • fix assert in ssl options clone #72326
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Make invariant/file-locking detection trim-safe #72331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disallow resetting initial thread apartment state #72332
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix prio1 test build #72335
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Do not use the string bit vector in regexes, if it's all ones or all zeroes. #72317
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #72314
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Properly calculate the ELF unwind info section size #72146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused field #72318
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1886359 #72303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [fxr] Use std::find_if when searching for root framework. #72080
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
